summary: Trissa is a potential young female follower. Contains two quests (for now) and a custom bow/arrow.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red]Trissa grew up as an orphan in Riften, the thieves guild trained her in archery and the art of pickpocketing.

When she got older she decided she wanted more than the thieves guild could offer. She wanted adventure. Now the Dovahkiin can help her with that goal.[/color]

[center][color=Cyan][size=4]Trissa - Archer Companion[/size][/color][/center]


[color=Cyan]What does this mod feature?[/color]

-Custom Bow and Arrow
-Two custom (not yet voiced, we\'ll see.) quests
-A loyal companion/spouse that levels with you.


[color=Cyan]This requires something, right?[/color]

Unfortunately yes, but only one mod :) thats right, ONLY ONE.

Azar Ponytail Hairstyles
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31797/


[color=Cyan]You haven\'t released many mods, is this full of bugs?[/color]
No. I have tested Trissa many times with different characters and different situations.

If you do find a bug though, let me know.



[color=Cyan]That\'s all cool, but what armor is she wearing on the pics?[/color]


-Elite Rogue Armour UNP-UNPB All-in-One Retexture ;)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35682/


[color=Cyan]No recommends? wtf is wrong with you!?[/color]

fine, here\'s a re-texture of Azar\'s ponytails.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37158/

(If i recommended every mod I like, itd take several paragraphs.)

[color=Cyan]Is that all?[/color]

Yep, if you have an Idea for Trissa You can comment if you want.


[color=Cyan]To-Do[/color]
-Add dialogue reaction to Main Quest, ThievesGuild/DarkBrotherhood, and Civil War Questlines.

-Dialogue reaction to other followers.

-Maybe another quest (?)
author: The SkyReaper
